name: MGK Crossfire® Aerosol | Insecticide Spray | Indoor Bed Bug Killer | for Long-Lasting Bed Bug Control | 17 Ounce Can
short_description: QUICK BED BUG KILLER: Kills bed bugs, including pyrethroid-resistant bed bugs, at all life stages, including eggs.
THREE ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Fast-acting bed bug spray aerosol that harnesses the power of Clothianidin, Metofluthrin and Piperonyl butoxide (PBO).
NON-STAINING TECHNOLOGY: CrossFire won't stain water-safe fabrics and surfaces. It may leave a visible mark on dark surfaces, which can be removed easily with a damp rag.
INDOOR APPLICATIONS: Suitable for use in commercial, institutional and residential facilities, including schools, nursing homes, houses and apartments.
A LEGACY YOU CAN TRUST: Driven by expertise and industry commitment, MGK has been developing pest control products based primarily on botanical and innovative technologies since 1902.

short_description: ✅ EFFICIENT: University and Laboratory Proven Bed Bug Spray for Home that Kills Bed Bugs Instantly 🎯. Eliminates Bed Bugs in All Stages of Development.

short_description: INSECT KILLER - Our pest control kills bedbugs, fleas, brown dog ticks, ants, spiders, stink bugs, boxelder bugs, clothes moths, dust mites, crickets, earwigs, millipedes, silverfish & more.

READY TO USE - This product is conveniently ready to use when it arrives. The spray nozzle makes this product easy to deploy.

name: BugMD 32 oz Ant Killer & Bug Spray - Roach and Cockroach Killer Indoor, Spider and Flea Spray for Home, Fly and Insect Defense, Natural, Safe with Essential Oils, Plant-Powered, Pest Control Pack of 2
short_description: Eliminate Home Invading Pests: BUGMD effectively targets hundreds of indoor and outdoor pests including ants, fleas, mosquitoes, roaches, mites, moths, spiders, and more. This essential oil-powered spray keeps your home, yard, and other spaces pest-free without compromising your family’s health and safety (when used as directed).

Ready-to-Use Formula: No mixing required. This 32 oz bottle comes pre-mixed and ready to spray, making it easy to use in bathrooms, bedrooms, pet areas, kitchens, baseboards, sheds, cabinets, gardens, and outdoor areas.

Plant-Powered Formula: BUGMD utilizes the power of plant oils such as cottonseed oil and clove oil. It’s safer for you and your family while effectively controlling pest invasions. Safe to use on wood, carpet, and fabrics.

Fast-Acting: Our essential oil-based spray kills some species in seconds and eliminates all within 30 minutes. BUGMD is effective even on species resistant to typical insecticides and sprays. Use this versatile formula as often as needed to quickly and safely protect your home.

Complete Pest Lifecycle Control: BUGMD effectively kills insects at all stages of their lifecycle. From eggs to larvae to adults, our formula powerfully eliminates pests on contact. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use as an effective cockroach killer.
